sentences.sContent: Any of several related plants, such as pennycress and watercress.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any of several related plants, such as pennycress and watercress.
sentences.sCn: 菥蓂，水田芥：任一与其类似的植物，如菥蓂和水田芥。

sentences.sContent: Like white mustard, field pennycress also has potential as a biodiesel crop.
sentences.sContent_eng: Like white mustard, field pennycress also has potential as a biodiesel crop.
sentences.sCn: 像白芥一样，野生菥蓂也有可能成为生物柴油作物。
